data.title: FlipGuard
data.description:
# Creating enterprise grade tooling & infrastructure for communities, users and builders - Our goal is to make Web 3.0 easy.

FlipGuard offers a one-stop shop for Web 3.0 enthusiasts looking for tools, games, and other useful applications to boost community engagement and generate alternative revenue streams. 

Our FlipGuard ecosystem, including our main tooling solutions and the FlipSuite discord bot, is performing exceedingly well since opening our services to the public. We're pleased to share that we've processed an impressive 250,000+ transactions on the Polygon chain - a significant milestone considering the short period.

On an average day, we're observing a transaction rate of 1000-2000. However, there are occasions when we've seen even higher spikes, demonstrating the potential and scalability of our platform.

Our user base is steadily expanding, currently boasting over 950 users, and we're welcoming an average of 15 to 50+ new users daily. Additionally, we're serving over 100 servers and more than 30 communities that actively use our tools.

Here's a quick overview of what FlipGuard has developed and made available to the public so far -

### Discord Bots
Web 3.0 On Discord - All-in-one solution with Global Wallets, Games, Utilities & Market Trackers on the Polygon Blockchain!

### NFT Utilities
Our service provides a comprehensive suite of both premium and free NFT tools. Designed to streamline the management, trading, and interaction with NFTs, these tools are invaluable resources for anyone involved in Web 3.0, from holders and collection team members to traders. Our premium NFT tools can be custom-tailored to a users needs with our own mini-language, Fluff.


### Community Cross Engagement
Boost and scale your Web 3.0 community through cross-community engagement. Showcase your ecosystem statistics and participate in global leaderboards via our FlipGuard dashboard.


### Trading Tools & Alerts
Gain instant access to valuable data that simplifies filtering out irrelevant information, allowing users and communities to focus on important, actionable insights through real-time alerts.

### FlipSuite - All In One Web 3.0 Discord Bot

- Easy to use and instant onboarding to Polygon
- Global Wallet System
- Send, Receive, and Withdraw within Discord
- Level up, unlock, and grow your profile
- Web 3.0 enabled modules (BattleGrounds, CoinFlip, Listing/Sales Tracking, Raiding, Shop, etc...)

## FlipAlerts - NFT Collection Alerts

- Alerts the instant an NFT is sold
- Track up to 4 wallets at once
- Tracks All Large Marketplaces
- Free to use!

## Rarity Bot - NFT Rarity Info In Discord
- Uses OpenRarity algorithm
- Clearly presents well-known rarity levels
- Option to set a default collection for each channel
- Free to use!

## FlipSweep - Web 3.0 Growth Made Easy

- Run Automated Sweep Contests
- Public Leaderboard + More
- Built In Wash Trade Protection
- Custom Contest Types

## FlipSnipe - Automate Your NFT Purchases

- Auto-Buy NFTs As They Are Listed
- Target Specific NFTs & Traits
- Supports Multiple Marketplaces
- Bring Your Own Wallet

## In Closing

What started out as 2 Web 3.0 die hards trying to do some good for the people of Polygon is now a legitimate player in the space, offering infrastructure, games and tooling communities actually want. 

We hope this broad overview of our offerings gives you a clear picture of where we're at and what we need, and we we look forward to receiving funding for the multitude of expenses that come with running FlipGuard at scale.

answers.question: The grant will be used to develop on Polygon
Grant Proposal
answers.answer:
# FlipGuard - Grant Proposal

**FlipGuard has solidified itself as an infrastructure and tooling provider on Polygon, and has done so completely self funded.**

### Our proven products:

- A complete Polygon payment layer for Discord called FlipSuite, packing a growing feature set including social and gamefi modules, with seamless transactions thanks to our own take on account abstraction. FlipSuite a truly a powerhouse of a product, solving many problems in one well thought out bot. 

- We've also built numerous tools and SaaS products like a custom NFT sweeping contest application with built in wash trade detection, listing and sales bots and a sniper bot.

Additionally, we've designed a mini language called Fluff, that allows NFT enthusiasts to create custom bots directly on our dashboard.

This proposal aims to tackle a few items:
- Reduce the burden of existing infrastructure costs
- Move our account abstraction layer to smart wallets/erc-4337 
- Develop a concept around an open API on-top of our web 3 payment layer for discord, allowing developers to build on it.

We also have many other developments in the pipeline, and since we're a lean team, grant funding of any kind directly contributes to all of them, like our in-discord MMO, which is currently in beta. 

### In closing

You may see that we're closed source, and as explained to the Polygon Village team, it's imperative that our code remains that way at our current stage of development, however, any official Polygon rep is welcome to contact us directly and we'd happily grant them access.

FlipGuard has been providing value to Polygon for just under a year, and hopes to continue doing so with the support provided here. 

Docs: https://wiki.flipguard.xyz
Dashboard: https://dashboard.flipguard.xyz
